item.title: Judy add a quote by Jill Paton Walsh
item.description: "Granted, a man may smile and smile and be a villain, but it takes nerve." -- Jill Paton Walsh

item.title: Judy add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Judy add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Never laugh at live dragons." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Judy add a quote by May Sinclair
item.description: "She sewed as she read. For the Vicar considered that sewing was an occupation and that reading was not. He was silent as long as his daughter sewed and when she read he talked." -- May Sinclair

item.title: Judy add a quote by L.M. Montgomery
item.description: "Isn't it nice to think that tomorrow is a new day with no mistakes in it yet?" -- L.M. Montgomery

item.title: Judy add a quote by Stephen Crane
Judy add a quote by Edgar Watson Howe
item.description: "When I get hold of a book I particularly admire, I am so enthusiastic that I loan it to someone who never brings it back." -- Edgar Watson Howe

item.title: Judy add a quote by Samuel Johnson
item.description: "Read over your compositions, and wherever you meet with a passage which you think is particularly fine, strike it out." -- Samuel Johnson

item.title: Judy add a quote by Charles Dickens
item.description: "[Credit is a system whereby] a person who can't pay, gets another person who can't pay, to guarantee that he can pay." -- Charles Dickens

item.title: Judy add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The truth is rarely pure and never simple." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Judy add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Judy add a quote by Garrison Keillor
item.description: "One reads books in order to gain the privilege of living more than one life. People who don't read are trapped in a mine shaft, even if they think the sun is shining." -- Garrison Keillor

item.title: Judy add a quote by Garrison Keillor
item.description: "A book is a gift you can open again and again." -- Garrison Keillor
